Uses of Package
org.restlet.engine

  • Packages that use org.restlet.engine 
    Package Description
    org.restlet.engine
    Implementation of Restlet API.
    org.restlet.engine.adapter
    Adapters between low-level HTTP calls and high-level Restlet Request and Response objects.
    org.restlet.engine.application
    Supports Restlet applications.
    org.restlet.engine.component
    Supports Restlet components.
    org.restlet.engine.connector
    Integration with Java URLConnection class.
    org.restlet.engine.converter
    Supports the converter service.
    org.restlet.engine.local
    Supports local connectors and resources.
    org.restlet.engine.security
    Supports security.
    org.restlet.engine.ssl
    Support SSL and TLS.
    org.restlet.engine.util
    General utilities.
  • Classes in org.restlet.engine used by org.restlet.engine 
    Class and Description
    Edition
    Enumeration of Restlet editions.
    Engine
    Engine supporting the Restlet API.
    Helper
    Abstract marker class parent of all engine helpers.
    RestletHelper
    Delegate used by API classes to get support from the implementation classes.
  • Classes in org.restlet.engine used by org.restlet.engine.adapter

    Helper
    Abstract marker class parent of all engine helpers.

    Delegate used by API classes to get support from the implementation classes.
